Articles.Content:
I'm really looking forward for the new update, but for one part:

whenever a fresh install of KSP boots up my speaker scream at me " DAa DAa DAAh dadada DAah da DAAA!"

of course there's the easy workaround of muting everything, but sometimes I forget, sometime I don't want to.

My speakers are pretty loud because my fader broke, so I run everthing at minimum, but KSP still is louder than anything else at default.

Is this also an issue for you? what are your preferred volume settings?

I have the same problem. When I make my YouTube videos, I have to turn the game's volume down to 2/100 for the proper noise levels, and anything over 5/100 is rather loud for me.

Maybe reducing the default volume to half or a third of its default levels would be appropriate.

1st thing i do on a new ksp install: remap "activate stage" to a key that is less likely to be hit accidentally.

2nd: put engine volume at 10%.
